Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Pegfilgrastim is approved to reduce the chance of infection in adults and children with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Neutropenia caused by myelosuppressive chemotherapy for non-myeloid cancer.

Section.Para: Pegfilgrastim is a form of filgrastim that has polyethylene glycol (PEG) attached to it. This form stays in the body longer than does filgrastim, so it doesnâ€™t need to be given as often. For more information about filgrastim, see the Drug Information Summary for Filgrastim.
